question: Match List-I and List-II with respect to proteins and their functions and select the correct option.
| List-I | List-II |
| 1. Collagen | p. Fights infectious agents |
| 2. Trypsin | q. Hormone |
| 3. Insulin | r. Enzyme |
| 4. Antibody | s. Intercellular ground substance |
explanation: Collagen (1) -> Intercellular ground substance (s). Trypsin (2) -> Enzyme (r). Insulin (3) -> Hormone (q). Antibody (4) -> Fights infectious agents (p).
